entry.title: $2295 // ***HOT DEAL***HUGE DUPLEX APARTMENT***SUPER LOCATION***NO FEES***
entry.content:
Gorgeous huge duplex apartment, Located in the prime Crown Heights area. Steps away from the S/2/3/4/5 train lines, various bus lines, near Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza, restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, CITI bikes and much more.

This is a huge duplex apartment, could be converted to a 2 bedroom apartment.
On the first floor is the kitchen with stainless steel appliances, microwave, modern bath, and the living room. With closet, hardwood floors, high ceiling, exposed brick, central a/c, ceiling fan, large sunny window, with lots of sunlight, 2 entrances to the apartment,
The lower level is a huge open space, with beautiful sunny windows, central a/c, the apartment is pet friendly.

*DONT MISS OUT THIS ONE TIME DEAL*

For just $2300 a month with no brokers fee.
For more details and to schedule a private showing contact Isidore show contact info

entry.title: $2050 // Prime Crown Heights Studio/1Bed
entry.content:
This 1Bed Flex, will not disappoint. For the individual(s) who have lived in Crown Heights for a while and understand the value of a great location. Within the apartment you will find updated cherry cabinets and an open concept layout. Complete with exposed brick and a set of immaculate French doors to give you the best possible feel. Finished off with dar stained hardwood floors and a separate foyer this apartment will be one thats hard to top.
Steps from the Franklin Avenue 2/3/4/5 train line and the S train line which connects to the C train. Conveniently located near Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza, restaurants, bars, cafes, shops, Citi Bikes and much more. Must See!

Amenities

- Exposed Brick
- Hardwood Floors
- High Ceilings
- French Doors

entry.title: $1975 // Fully renovated 1 bedroom apartment
entry.content: Gorgeous 1 bedroom boasts an equally large bedroom and living room Amazing kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a microwave, and granite counter tops. The modern, granite kitchen bar The living room area is very spacious There are large windows that provide natural light throughout. The bedroom fits a queen size bed plus furniture and comes with closet space. The apartment is centrally located close to dining, transportation, shopping and fitness centers/gyms. very close to 2,3,4,5 and A,C trains
